name: Obelisk of Fortuity
author: D1000
description: An ancient Obelisk. Some powers are hidden here, but something seems wrong. Maybe it just has to warm up a bit.

name: Altar of Fortuity
author: Neotopia
description: A very old Altar of an ancient religion. Still imbued with the power of the gods, maybe you should wake them up.

name: Shrine of Fortuity
author: Neotopia
description: An old Shrine of an ancient religion. Numerous humans prayed on this, leading to immense power. Maybe you should pray!

name: Dome of Fortuity
author: Neotopia
description: An old Dome of an ancient religion. Numerous congregations were hold in this, enchanting it with immense power. Congregate and awake the ancient powers!

name: Sanctuary of Fortuity
author: Neotopia
description: The Sanctuary of an old religion. Uncountable prayers led to the power of this. Even more prayers needed to awake the powers!

name: Sewer Connection
author: D1000
description: A connection to the canalization. Toxic vapors are leaking out.

name: Broken Pipeline
author: D1000
description: A pipeline which transports poisonous substances. Toxic vapors and other dangerous things are leaking out at the broken spot.

name: Chemical Center
author: D1000
description: An assembly point for a lot of pipelines. Not less leaky spots were formed during the years. Everthing is contaminated by toxic substances.

name: Contaminated Hitch
author: D1000
description: An extremly inhospitable place. Stinking and toxic fluids and gases are everywhere. It seems that somewhere in the middle of the construct something is glowing....

name: Militia Watchtower
author: ShyGnome
description: Militia guardians rain axes at the heads of the enemies. However, they are not very accurate, and afraid of undead and large creeps.

author: Boekie/D1001
description: A tower which transforms solar-energy in to pure force.

description: Can fire different bombs for a great versatility.

name: Grand Bomb Turret
author: DaveMatthews
description: Can fire different bombs for a great versatility.

name: Silver Knight
author: SirCoqalot.
description: Rare tower with a chance to turn lesser creeps into gold instantly. Gains additional gold for each kill and will do more damage the more gold you have.

name: Golden Queen
author: SirCoqalot.
description: Rare tower with a chance to turn lesser creeps into gold instantly. Gains additional gold for each kill and will do more damage the more gold you have.

name: Marine
author: Boekie
description: A highly esteemed footsoldier with low self esteem.

name: Experienced Marine
author: Boekie
description: A highly esteemed footsoldier with moderate self esteem.

name: Dwarven Forgery
author: geX
description: Hidden in the mountains, the dwarven master smiths polish found items to release their true power.

name: Bronze Dragon Roost
author: cedi
description: The mechanical version of the other two dragon roosts.

name: Coin Machine
author: Boekie
description: This machine is used to make money.

name: Gold Machine
author: Boekie
description: This machine is used to make money.

name: Xeno Research Facility
author: Palandu
description: Empowers you against the alien menace. Model credits: SirCoqaLot plus mOck and MasterCassim.

name: Ball Lightning Accelerator
author: cedi
description: This deadly thing was invented by the dwarves to aid them in the long war against the orcs. However they never ended up using it, as it consumes far too much energy.

name: Electric Death
author: cedi
description: This deadly thing was invented by the dwarves to aid them in the long war against the orcs. However they never ended up using it, as it consumes far too much energy.The second generation can be the end of the world...

name: Goblin Stronghold
author: cedi
description: You should always consider goblin-made items to be a nuclear weapon with a faulty trigger, you just might live to see another day.

name: Gatling Gun
author: Boekie
description: A very powerful gun created by the dwarves. It has a chance to fire a burst of projectiles.

name: Valor
author: cedi
description: A truly inspiring sight.

name: Nuclear Missile Launcher
author: Matac
description: Pure manmade destruction.

name: Grab-o-Bot
author: cedi
description: When you think it looks very fragile, you're right. But its also a devastating machine.

name: Glaive Master
author: Ashbringer
description: Eviscerate them all, make them bleed.

name: The Steam Engine
author: Glowackos/cedi
description: One of the greatest inventions of the dwarves.

name: Average Cactus

name: Grown Cactus
author: Lapsus
description: A troublesome desert plant with a high AoE. Moderately more efficient against mass creeps and humans.

name: Blooming Cactus
author: Lapsus
description: A troublesome desert plant with a high AoE. Efficient against mass creeps and humans.

name: Fully-Flowered Cactus
author: Lapsus
description: A lethal desert plant with a high AoE. Very efficient against mass creeps and humans.
